sentences.sContent: ...This behavior may have evolved as dogs gradually learned they could benefit from avoiding conflicts with humans...
...it is an offensive behavior when people write Chinese names in red ink...
...The research references studies of people's behavior with food and alcohol and results of alcohol restrictions...
...then their behavior doesn't match their beliefs...
...The research references studies of people's behavior with food and alcohol and results of alcohol restrictions...
...Lisa Lahey, who coaches executives how to sustain behavior change...
...What she hadn’t known at the time of the interview was that the candidate’s “different” behavior was simply a cultural misunderstanding...
...museums can make some regulations to guide the behavior of visitors or set some closed days for museums for regular maintenance...
...All I did was let him know his behavior was unacceptable...
It is important to reward good behavior.
sentences.sCn: 表现好要给予奖励，这是很重要的。

phrases.pCn: 动态行为；动态特性；能动行为
机械特性；力学特征；机械行为
流变特性；龄行为，龄性行为

words.tran: 行为；习性；运行状况（等于behavior）
表现；（机器等）运转；举止端正；（事物）起某种作用

trans.tranOther: the things that a person or animal does
